content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; contains 48 units of iron ore and is currently out of fuel.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; fueled with 2 units of coal, has produced 6 copper plates, and is awaiting ingredients.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research with input {automation-science-pack: 10} and status NO_POWER.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13488 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections” and status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C with warning “out of fuel”; has connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and is now using fluid_system [50676].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) holding ~99.86 units of water at 15°C, status WORKING; with a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and using fluid_system [50676].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50676 at position(-6.5, 20.5) [WORKING].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50677 at position(-2.5, 20.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50678 at position(-0.5, 21.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50683 at position(-3.5, 23.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50682 at position(-7.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50687 at position(3.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50686 at position(2.5, 24.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50689 at position(-0.5, 28.5) [EMPTY].

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Issues:
  • Repeated attempts to connect the boiler output to the Steam Engine left inlet using non-working PipeGroup fluid_system identifiers (previously attempted: 49988, 50031, 50074, 50117, 50160, 50203, 50246, 50289; recently attempted: 50332, 50375, 50418, 50461, 50504, 50547, 50590, 50633) have all failed.
  • Tip: Dynamically validate available PipeGroup fluid_system identifiers and ensure they are active before attempting connection.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains without fuel, inhibiting steam generation.
  • Tip: Monitor boiler fuel levels regularly and replenish as needed.
